alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Jefferson; Pickens; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Tuscaloosa, east central Pickens, central Bibb and southwestern Jefferson Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 814 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Jena to near Eoline. Movement was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tuscaloosa, Northport, Brent, Centreville, Holt, Lake View, Brookwood, Coaling, Vance, Woodstock, West Blocton, Coker, Bull City, McFarland Mall, Tuscaloosa Amphitheater, Tuscaloosa Regional Airport, Lake Wildwood, Mercedes Benz Of Alabama, Eoline and North Bibb. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
